input:
Summarize: The Nikon AF-S 80-400mm is slightly lighter and of course better appointed than the Sigma's, although the Sigma was no slouch.
Nikon 10-24 is more useful, better built, faster to focus, easer to manually override AF if needed, sharper and therefore better than Sigma 10-20.
Canon isn't much better, though: They pump out new APS-C bodies faster than most people change their underwear - but their EF-S lenses are completely incompatible with their FF bodies (they don't have a crop mode like Nikon).
Nikon glass will always be superior to Sigma.
I think most people see Sigma cameras and lenses as inferior to brands like Nikon and Canon.
I could imagine if you would want a lighter and smaller option, the Nikon is better than the Sigma.
My Nikon 14mm-24mm zoom, at 14mm, is clearly superior to a Sigma 14mm f2.8 I have and in my opinion, slightly better than my Nikon 14mm f2.8.
1 stop faster than the Nikon and I like the color rendition better than the Sigma 10-20 which I used to have.
I'm sure Nikon can do better than Sigma.
On the one hand you have some who would claim that anything badged as Nikon or Canon is superior to anything badged Sigma.
It definitely focuses faster and works better than a nikon G in low light conditions.
The Sigma has faster autofocus but the Tamron had even better IQ than the Nikon 18-200, what a dilemma .
If they can make it better than there 60mm (which I bought, as it was FAR superior to the nikon macros I tried) it will be well worth the price, and maybe even better than the nikon 105mm .
Sigma 17-70 HSM OS + better range than the 18-55 + faster (but not as fast as the Tamron) + 9" min focus - macro use + cheaper than Nikon .
The sigma is much faster focusing and better then the Nikon 1.4 g in the center at all of the low apertures.
It did however, focus faster and quieter than my old Nikon 70-200 and was lighter.
The Sigma and Tamron are superior to the Nikon, because .
I believe Sigma 24-105 has better optics than 24-105 Canon kit or 24-120 Nikon, and superior to 24-85 Nikon kit I own.
Build quality is superior to Sigma and Tamron and certainly the same or better than canon and nikon equivalents.
Generally it's slightly better than the Nikon 18-200 but and slightly worse than my huge Nikon 28-70 and 80-200 f2.8 AF-S lenses.
output:
Nikon and Sigma are both well-known brands in the field of photography, each with its own strengths and weaknesses.

According to some users, Nikon has superior glass compared to Sigma and has lenses that are more useful, better built, faster to focus, and sharper. Similarly, some argue that Nikon's mm-mm zoom lens is superior to the Sigma mm f. lens. However, others point out that the Sigma has faster autofocus and better optics in some cases. The build quality of Nikon is compared favorably to Sigma.

Some argue that Sigma cameras and lenses are inferior to brands like Nikon and Canon, while some praise Sigma for being cheaper and faster-focusing. Also, some users note that Nikon lenses are lighter and of better quality than Sigma's. There are also comparisons between Sigma and Tamron lenses, with some stating that Tamron has better IQ.

Ultimately, which brand is better depends on personal preferences and priorities. While some argue that Nikon is superior to Sigma in certain aspects, others think that Sigma can outperform Nikon in some situations.

Summarize: But you'd still need faster caches to compensate (historically IBM's L3 is very slow and its L2, I believe, is still slower than Intel).
IBM has no magic fairy dust to do (much) better than Intel in a smaller die with worse process tech.
Fact is that Intel/AMD processors ARE FASTER than IBM PPC970.
The speed advantage of PC over MAC was not that Intel/AMD were so much faster than IBM G4, then G5, but the OS and drivers are much finer tuned.
Intel chips are cheaper and faster than what Apple was getting from IBM.
Intel Pentium processors are typically faster than IBM PowerPC chips in desktop applications; .
Ex: Intel Core Duo Imac 2.0 is 2x faster then Imac IBM G5 2.0.
Intel has and always will have faster chips (and more) than IBM or Moto.
Actually Intel says it can build cpus cooler at 65nm than 90nm, so IBM was correct.
If Intel gets it done better than IBM, then so be it.)
IBM introduced a new range of systems capable of handling massive amounts of computational data faster at nearly 20 percent better price/performance than comparable Intel Xeon v3 Processor-based systems - providing clients a superior alternative to closed, commodity-based data center servers.
In October, IBM introduced a new range of POWER systems Â capable of handling massive amounts of computational data faster at nearly 20 percent better price/performance than comparable Intel Xeon v3 processor-based systems, delivering to clients a superior alternative to closed, commodity-based data center servers.
The current Powerpc (IBM 970)architecture is far superior to Intel.
GloFo has the brain power of IBM research behind it, superior to anything Intel.
If IBM ever decide that they're better off with Intel or anything else, they'd drop POWER quicker than you can blink.
IBM creates more technology (and better) than Intel.
Maybe they can make it run faster than Intel processor.
IBM will ALWAYS be a better chipmaker than Intel.
AMD is better then Intel :D - by jojajijo .
In semiconductors, for example, Jones says IBM is "bringing their technology to market faster than the competition-faster than Intel, faster than Motorola, faster than Texas Instruments, faster than Fujitsu."
output:
Intel and IBM are both major players in the technology industry. While some argue that Intel has faster and cheaper chips, others argue that IBM has superior technology, including the ability to handle massive amounts of computational data faster at a better price/performance rate than comparable Intel systems, and better brain power behind it through GloFo. Some argue that IBM can bring technology to market faster than the competition, including Intel.

However, there are also arguments that Intel has better caching and faster processors and that IBM's PPC processor is slower than Intel/AMD processors. Additionally, some claim that the speed advantage of PC over Mac is not due to the processors, but rather the OS and drivers.

Ultimately, which brand is better may depend on specific needs and preferences. For example, some users prefer AMD over Intel. Regardless of personal opinions, both Intel and IBM have made significant contributions to the development of technology, and their continued innovation will shape the future of the industry.

input:
Summarize: "Girls volleyball and cross country would probably be harder hit than football.
However, football officials also perceived greater stress than volleyball officials for the 'fear of physical harm' factor.
Look for fields where the inherent demands are less (e.g., golf rather than football) or competition is lighter (e.g., volleyball instead of basketball).
The STC football team has practiced during the cooler evenings, while the STC volleyball squad has enjoyed the gym, which is slightly cooler than its usual temperature during the opening weeks of practice.
Tennessee kept its football bowl hopes alive with a thrilling overtime win over Vanderbilt, and the Lady Vols clinched no worse than a tie for the SEC volleyball championship to headline UT's sports weekend.
While it's apparent that volleyball action is harder to choreograph than football action, as there are no helmets and pads to obscure the identity of the stunt players, I appreciate how Tyra's presence didn't magically make the team great.
The few goals in any given football match - there are even games that end 0-0 - are tedious for many who prefer the faster pace of basketball or volleyball, where games end with dozens, and generally more than 100, points.
Most notably, the football team under first-year coach Bill O'Brien had a better-than-expected 8-4 record, and the school has also had success in women's soccer, women's volleyball, women's basketball and wrestling, among other sports.
To Fargo1 and Co. if you only support the football and basketball teams, you are a far superior fan and alum than if you, in addition to supporting said, also support the likes of soccer, baseball, field hockey, volleyball, etc. .
It was better than the football game.
All in all, Football (like Basketball, like Waterpolo) is inferior to Rugby Union or Volleyball, because one can bring the family to follow the latter group more or less everywhere around the world.
Deford was here for a far better story than a football matchup.
Ohio's favorite son, Archie Griffin, is the original subject of the line, "he's a better young man than he is a football player and he's the best football player I've seen."
NMU continues Homecoming weekend Saturday (Sept. 21) with the volleyball team hosting Lake Superior State at 1 p.m. and the football team hosting Ohio Dominican at 3 p.m. at the Superior Dome.
Tonight's games Volleyball Ishpeming at Superior Central, 7 Football Bellaire at Rapid River, 7 North Central at Stephenson, 7 Superior Central at Ewen-Trout Creek, 7 Bark River-Harris at West Iron......
The women's volleyball team went one better than the men's football team did on the opening day of Euro 2012 by sealing the win, collecting two points in the process.
Volleyball fans will be admitted "free" to the Oct. 14, 4 p.m. match against Lake Superior State if they bring their football ticket stub from Saturday's 1 p.m. "Band Day" football game versus Ashland.
output:
Football and volleyball are both popular sports, but they have different characteristics that appeal to different people.

Football is perceived as a more physical sport with a higher risk of physical harm, while volleyball is seen as a less demanding and lower-risk sport. Football games may have slower pacing with fewer goals, while volleyball games generally have more points and faster pacing. 

Some people prefer the family-friendly atmosphere of volleyball games, which they can follow around the world. Others appreciate the excitement and thrill of football games, or the success of their favorite teams in different sports. 

Overall, the choice between football and volleyball depends on personal preferences and priorities. Fans may enjoy attending games for either sport, and athletes may prefer one sport over the other based on their interests and skill sets.

Wallets and mobile phones are two ways to carry important items such as cash and credit cards. There are different arguments regarding their advantages and disadvantages.

Some argue that it is no easier or faster to use a mobile phone for payments than to use a wallet, whereas others contend that mobile payment is easier and faster than carrying a wallet. Concerns are also raised about the security of mobile phones if lost or for the wait times to add credit and debit cards to Google Wallet service. However, some believe that mobile payment is as safe or safer than using a wallet due to encryption and PIN protection.

In terms of the physical safety of wallets, front pocket wallets or money clips are considered safer than wallets kept in back pants pockets as they are harder for a pickpocket to access. Whereas some argue that losing a phone is worse than losing a wallet, Google suggests that its app is safer than a real wallet. Some also say that mobile coupons are easier and faster to use than paper coupons.

Overall, the choice between a wallet or a mobile phone as a means of carrying essential items is a personal preference that depends on individual priorities, security concerns, and practicality.

input:
Summarize: Faster than the laptop, and much better than using the phone.
A lot smaller and lighter than the laptop but much easier to use than the phone.
Plus on the desktop/laptop/tablet I can type a lot faster than using my thumbs on my phone which I love!
I have several laptops and desktops for anything other than making calls, and even my 12" laptop is much better for doing anything other than phone calls, because I can see what I am doing better.
I've been in dire need of a mobile computer that is smaller, lighter and more readily accessible than a laptop and bigger, faster and more functional than a mobile phone.
My laptop is easier to use than my phone.
It would be more portable than a laptop, easier to read the screen than my small android phone, and all-around a better way of living!
Sounds from our laptop were clearly better than the mobile phone MP3 files, yet the pairing process was oddly faster with mobiles.
The diminutive keyboard is of course harder to type on than a regular laptop, but it had a reasonable touch for something so small and was much faster than phone typing.
It is far cheaper and lighter than a laptop or a UMPC, uses cheap standard replacement parts, has a better UI than a UMPC, is less limited than a typical PDA or phone.
And it's EASIER and FASTER than a Laptop!
Pages load quicker, the navigation is easier than a website that is just built for a PC or laptop.
It's faster and runs smoother than my laptop, so although I was very much skeptical with this purchase, I am now quite happy and feel rather smug about it.
Yes, the IOS is nifty, but having a device that is larger than a smart phone yet lighter and faster than any laptop can really change your computing habits.
I kind of wish this software was available for PC, as it almost makes typing on the phone faster and easier than a laptop.
gadget tool would be that being larger than a phone screen, it is easier on slightly more mature eyes and it is a helluva lighter to haul around than my laptop with a 17 inch screen.
There are some things I'd swear this phone does better and faster (maybe because it streamlines processes so much and leaves out the non-essential) than my desktop or laptop.
Best email client on a phone, have my work and non work emails tiled on the screen , helps me manage my email alot better - sometimes it's just quicker to read email on my phone rather than checking my laptop at work lol.
The phone you carry in your pocket is, in many ways, considerably smarter than your PC and laptop ever were.
The keypad of Status is in no way inferior to that of a laptop.
output:

Some users argue that laptops are better than phones for certain tasks like typing faster and seeing what they are doing better. Additionally, laptops provide larger screens and better sound quality. Others argue that phones are smaller and lighter than laptops, making them more readily accessible, and have better email clients and streamlined processes that sometimes make them better and faster than desktop computers or laptops. 

Both laptops and phones have unique features that make them useful for different purposes. For example, some say that phones are easier and faster for internet browsing and navigating, while others argue that laptops are more functional and efficient for complex tasks. Ultimately, the choice between a laptop and a phone depends on the specific task at hand and the personal preferences of the user.

On the other hand, some argue that Oracle has a better overall implementation and functionality, which cannot be matched by other RDBMSs. There are also arguments suggesting that both weapons have their uses and limitations, depending on the situation. Ultimately, the choice between pistol and knife (or any other weapon) depends on one's personal circumstances and preferences, as well as one's familiarity and training with the weapon of choice.

Summarize: It was faster than the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550-Ti reference design, but was slower than the overclocked versions by ASUS and MSI.
MSI claims the solution keeps the card 16 degrees cooler and 6.7dB quieter than NVIDIA reference design cooler.
The MSI NX8800GT OC isn't any worse than the Nvidia GeForce 8800 GTX starting from a resolution of 1600x1200 and even provides a better minimum of speed.
Manloi try the frame limiter in MSI afterburner, it works better than the nvidia one.
Benchmark Results: The MSI Radeon R9 270 Gaming OC was actually faster than the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 580!
At the resolution of 1920x1080 the MSI card was 2.07 frames per second faster than the NVIDIA reference card.
At the resolution of 1920Ã—1080 the MSI card was 2.07 frames per second faster than the NVIDIA reference card.
The MSI N550GTX-Ti Cyclone II 1GD5/OC was found to be 5% faster than the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti!
MSI claims its Twin Frozr IV cooler offers temperatures 20Â°C lower, and is 11.7 dBA quieter than NVIDIA reference design cooling solution.
The MSI Cyclone II cooler is very similar to the previous generation MSI Cyclone cooler, it extends on the NVIDIA reference design cooler and does away with the plastic shroud and exhausts hot air inside your case rather than through the rear PCI bracket.
The MSI N560GTX-448 Twin Frozr III Power Edition was just 1 FPS slower than the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570 at both 1920Ã—1080 and 1280Ã—1024 screen resolutions and was 4-6 FPS faster than the overclocked ASUS ENGTX560 TI DirectCU II video card.
At 2560Ã—1600 the GTX 690 was nearly 95% faster than the GTX 680 and 130% faster than the MSI R7970 Lightning 3GB graphics card!
On this game title the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 was 30% faster than the MSI R7970 Lightning!
The MSI NX8800GT OC is slightly slower than the Nvidia GeForce 8800 GTS 320MB at high resolutions, which is quite a surprise.
We found the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 with the reference cooler to be quieter than the MSI R7970 Lighting with the new Twin Frozr IV GPU cooler at both idle and full load in Furmark!
The NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 performed really better than the MSI R7970 Lighting 3GB at both 1280Ã—1024 and 1920Ã—1080 screen resolutions, but at an Ultra HD resolution like 2560Ã—1600 the MSI R7970 Lighting pulls ahead just slightly.
Benchmark Results: The MSI N560GTX-448 Twin Frozr III Power Edition video card was found to be less than one frame per second slower than the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570 reference design in Just Cause 2.
The EVGA Classified uses a custom cooler as well that includes a dual fan design that is just barely louder than the MSI card.
The NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 2GB performed better than the MSI R7970 Lightning 3GB at both 1280Ã—1024 and 1920Ã—1080 screen resolutions, but at an Ultra HD resolution like 2560Ã—1600 and 5760Ã—1080 the MSI R7970 Lightning pulls ahead just slightly.
The Asus gTX 560 DirectCU was actually a hair faster than the Radeon HD 6870 here, but the MSI card finished right on par with the similarly priced Radeon.
output:
MSI and Nvidia are two popular brands of graphics cards, and each has its own strengths and weaknesses.

According to users, some MSI cards are faster than Nvidia reference designs, while others are slightly slower. MSI also claims to offer better cooling and quieter operation than Nvidia reference designs. 

Other arguments suggest that MSI cards may perform better than similar cards from other brands like ASUS, while some users have praise for MSI's Cyclone and Twin Frozr coolers. 

On the other hand, Nvidia is praised for its performance in some benchmarks, while MSI falls behind. Additionally, some users have found Nvidia's reference coolers to be quieter than MSI's Twin Frozr IV cooler. 

Ultimately, the choice between MSI and Nvidia graphics cards may depend on personal preferences, budget, and performance needs. It's important to research and read reviews before making a decision to ensure that you get the best graphics card for your specific use case.

Summarize: Many people claim that Honda Civic, Mazda 3....and other "small" cars are better equipped and superior to Toyota Corolla.
That's as quick as a V6 Honda Accord, which is FWD (which means it's lighter) and has 240 horsepower, quicker than a FWD Toyota Camry V6 and very near the 0-60 times of the six-cylinder BMW 330Xi and G35X.
Well, shit's getting harder Honda, sorry to tell you.
Also, Honda ATs in my experience operate with better logic and far better responsiveness than any of the so-called "superior" offerings from competitors (dating back to '09 Pilot which was "stuck" with a 5AT while GM and Toyota CUVs had 6ATs.
(Nissan is a bit slower than Honda- but Honda is really fast.
Toyota is slightly weaker in that Yaris and Sienna are slightly inferior to their Honda counterparts.
Honda claims the load area of 408 litres is superior to the Toyota Prius.
Honda also has better service than toyota.
A HSV-010 with the Honda V10 990+ hp from 2005 would be far greater than any Toyota V10 (F1 or not) motor in terms of performance and sound.
As good as Honda and better than Toyota.
2013 Toyota Camry Advantages The Toyota Camry is softer, simpler and requires a bit of a lighter touch than the Honda Accord.
Toyota's third row seat has a gas shock the helps raise and lower it and I feel it is safer and easier to use than the Honda.
From what they used to look like, the new Toyotas have much, much nicer styling, certainly way better than Honda and Nissan.
I'm a Honda man (their SUVs are inferior to Toyota, but I don't like SUVs).
The A/C is much better than the A/C in the Honda hybrid - gets cold much faster.
Toyota interiors are also nicer and more ergonomic than Honda.
The shape of the Toyota was nicer than the Honda.
I bought the Corolla because I felt it was mechanically superior to the Honda.
It completed MT's figure eight in 27.9 seconds, better than the Honda and Ford and less than a second slower than the VW , Nissan, and Toyota .
Way smoother than my Honda Fit, even smoother than my year-old Hyundai Elantra Touring.
output:
Honda and Toyota are two popular car manufacturers with their respective strengths and weaknesses.

Some people claim that Honda makes better small cars, such as the Civic and Mazda , and that Honda cars are faster than Toyota cars. Others argue that Toyota is softer, simpler, and requires a lighter touch than Honda, and that Toyota's third-row seat is safer and easier to use. Furthermore, some argue that Toyota has nicer styling, more ergonomic interiors, and better mechanical superiority. In terms of specific models, Honda is said to have a better load area than the Toyota Prius, while Toyota's Corolla completes MT's figure eight in . seconds, better than the Honda and Ford.

Service is also a factor, as some argue that Honda has better service than Toyota. However, others claim that Toyota A/C is much better and gets cold much faster.

Therefore, the choice between Honda and Toyota may depend on personal preferences and needs. It's a good idea to read reviews and do research on specific models to get a better understanding of their performance, reliability, and features.

SUVs and trucks are both popular vehicles used for transporting passengers and cargo, but they have some differences and similarities.

SUVs are generally praised for providing a smoother ride than truck-based SUVs and pickups, having better gas mileage, and offering more comfortable lounging. Some drivers also argue that they feel more comfortable and drive better in an SUV. 

Trucks, on the other hand, are preferred for heavier work, such as hauling boats, cleaning out dog mess, or carrying large cargo. They are generally heavier and more powerful than SUVs and some of them can achieve better performance in off-road conditions or rough terrain. They may, however, be less fuel-efficient than SUVs and provide louder road noise than some of their SUV competitors. 

It is important to note that SUVs have various subcategories, and car-based SUVs may handle better and offer a smoother ride than truck-based SUVs. Additionally, certain SUV models may offer better performance and comfort than others. 

Ultimately, choosing between an SUV and a truck depends on the kind of work or transport you require, as well as your personal preferences.
